definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Carnitine is a nutrient that helps the body turn fat into energy.
sentences.chinese: 肉鹼是一種營養，幫助人體脂肪轉化爲能量。

sentences.english: Then, from Tuesday afternoon through Thursday, the stars send intense and beautiful energy your way.
sentences.chinese: 從週二下午到週四，巨蟹宮將會釋放強勁的能量。

sentences.english: The most commonly used form of radar energy return mapping is the Base Reflectivity graph.
sentences.chinese: 最常用的雷達能量回程測繪形式是基本反射率圖。

sentences.english: We have 800-ton heat treatment capability per month.
sentences.chinese: 生產手段齊全能量大，生產能力每月可達800噸。

sentences.english: GRBs come from some of the most energetic explosions known in the Universe.
sentences.chinese: GRBs來自宇宙中某些最高能量的爆炸。

sentences.english: Astrologers think of the water-bearer as pouring life-enhancing energy into the ether.
sentences.chinese: 占星學家認爲這個水瓶，是將生命的能量注入靈性。

sentences.english: The bursts have much more energy than the normal local variations in temperature.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的爆發具備相比常規溫變強大的多的能量。

sentences.english: Much of the body's energy is wasted uselessly .
sentences.chinese: 多數的身體的能量就這樣白白浪費了。

sentences.english: Understanding your hardware and its energy usage.
sentences.chinese: 清楚你的硬件及其能量使用。

sentences.english: Worker mobility gives the tech industry fluidity, velocity, and energy.
sentences.chinese: 員工流動賦予科技產業流動性，週轉性和能量。

sentences.english: The locks prevent its downward and upward movement at the same time stimulating energy.
sentences.chinese: 收束在阻塞了能量上下運動的同時，也刺激着能量。

sentences.english: The locks prevent its downward and upward movement at the same time stimulating energy.
sentences.chinese: 收束在阻塞了能量上下運動的同時，也刺激着能量。

sentences.english: Positive energies are essentially forms of love.
sentences.chinese: 而正面能量本質上來說也都是愛。

sentences.english: This interdimensional energy has a cohesion to it.
sentences.chinese: 這內次元能量有一個內聚力。

sentences.english: That’s because the friction of the wheels and track slowly drain energy away from the train.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲輪子與軌道的摩擦力會逐漸削弱車體的能量。

sentences.english: Xenon lamp IR energy is ideal for flash fusing toner.
sentences.chinese: 氙燈紅外能量是理想的閃光融合碳粉。
